reviewText: It stayed funny and engaging, even as it moved beyond the initial premise. It's great to see these guys being so funny and so young.
We really like watching this show again. Funny!

I remember watching this in high school.  Every character stood out on their own.  Donna Dixon was my favorite-playing Sonny Lumet-beautiful and brainy.  Wendie Jo Sperber was also wonderful.  It She had the best lines.  I always liked to see Hanks and Scolari get into the women's clothing before they got caught.  Every episode is very funny and it's nice to seethem again!

I have been a Bosom Buddies fan since the show came out. Why it still doesn't air is beyond me. This and all the other video's are must haves. When ever I need a smile - these are the tapes that do it!
